name: HamStar
description:
Our entry for the Ludum Dare Game Jam 47!

HamStar, North Americas most prominent stunt Hamster; is ready for some high flying action in this pinball meets bullethell arcade game! Fly through rings of fire, pluck Eagle Knievels out of the air, and take down the snake on plane to achieve your highscore!

Contributors:

Anthony Posselli

Benjamin Weinberg

Hayden Griffin

Jingyi Zhang

Michael Caldwell
